response.overview: It tells the story of Hajj Chaoui, the financier of a Marrakesh party, who works hard to raise his three daughters in the best way after the death of his wife. Commitment and discipline govern his daily life and his relationship with his three daughters. However, something surprising will change this behavior and this relationship when he will notice it on the screen. A computer showed a picture of him as a young man next to his mother, whose features he had changed using Photoshop. This surprise had a great impact on him, as he decided to be interested in what this virtual world had in store, the world of computers, the Internet, and social networking sites.
response.title: بابا تكونيكتا
